name: Word Game (itch) (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player's task is to guess all the words from the proposed list of letters. To write a word, the player must enter it using the keyboard. By pressing the appropriate letter - the selected letter will be highlighted on the screen, after the letters selected in the correct order - the player must press enter.
  • The game is controlled by the keyboard.
  • A lot of levels.
  • Points are awarded for guessing words.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Word-Game

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
